data.name: Dolphin Defense - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the soundtrack for Dolphin Defense. It contains 29 tracks including 3 with Cyber Diva. Dance along to your favorite songs from the Vive game!

NEW SONGS

  • La La Lie
  • Torn
  • Dark Explorer Teaser
  • SUNSETあの日
  • Invisible

TRACK LIST

1. Save the Dolphins [feat. Hits Up & Cyber Diva]

2. Chocolate Mountain
3. Stomp the Ground
4. Sorting
5. The Cliff
6. Cherry Gum Mountain [feat. Cyber Diva]
7. Fire Grass Water
8. Spooky Mountain
9. Here We Go (Pepper) [feat. Hits Up]
10. Pink and Blue
11. Good Friends (Julius)
12. Boss (Takeru)
13. Mountain Love [feat. Cyber Diva]
14. Trip Hard (Saki)
15. Let's Get into It
16. Spinner
17. Strong AI
18. Take 2
19. Aspiration
20. Touch
21. Dolphin Defense Department Theme
22. Results
23. Alternate World
24. Field Training
25. La La Lie
26. Torn
27. Dark Explorer Teaser
28. SUNSETあの日
29. Invisible

data.short_description: This is the soundtrack for Dolphin Defense. It contains 29 tracks including 3 with Cyber Diva.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7‑3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
